title: CollectServiceFabricData Phase 3 Test Results
body:
Phase 3 test execution completed with 98.8% success rate (84/85 tests passed). Key findings:

**SUCCESSES:**
- All data processing tests passed (CsvCounterRecord functionality)
- All collection orchestration tests passed (task management, component coordination)
- File management tests largely successful (PopulateCollection, stream operations)
- Configuration validation working correctly

**ISSUES DISCOVERED:**
1. FileObject null handling: Expected ArgumentNullException but FileObjectCollection.AddRange throws NullReferenceException at line 34
2. Kusto federated security limitation in .NET Framework 4.6.2 (works on newer frameworks)

**API CORRECTIONS VALIDATED:**
- CsvCounterRecord.CounterValue as Decimal type ✓
- FileObject.RelativeUri readonly property ✓
- Instance.Totals() method accessibility ✓
- Non-virtual method testing patterns ✓

**TESTING APPROACH:**
- Real instance usage instead of mocking non-virtual methods
- Multi-framework testing reveals framework-specific limitations
- Phase 3 represents significant step up in complexity from Phase 2

Phase 3 establishes robust data processing and orchestration testing foundation for CollectServiceFabricData.
